title: Log into EBIS 2.5 as Club
custom_steps:
WHEN User inputs login credentials **( admin-sd-all/containjust357 )**
and Clicks Log in
custom_expected:
THEN User successfully logins to Club login
AND Home display for that club is displayed.

title: User navigates to Rule 4 Signing Utility via Minor Contracts on Left Nav
custom_preconds: GIVEN User is logged in as club admin
custom_steps:
WHEN User navigates to minor contracts on left navigation
AND Clicks Rule 4 Signing Bonuses on popover
custom_expected: THEN Rule 4 Signing Bonus utility appears on page

title: Club scrolls through all 40 picks
custom_preconds: GIVEN User is on Rule 4 Signing Bonus utility
custom_steps: WHEN User scrolls through utility
custom_expected: THEN Club has players appearing for rounds 1 through 40.

title: Players are linked to their player profile
custom_preconds: GIVEN User is on Rule 4 Signing Bonus utility
custom_steps: WHEN User clicks on a player's name on the rule 4 utility
custom_expected: THEN The user is directed to the player's profile

title: User goes to a player's Minor Contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN User is on Rule 4 Signing Utility
custom_steps: WHEN User selects signed date
custom_expected: THEN Minor Contract of that player appears

title: User expands addendum B
custom_preconds: GIVEN User is in a Minor Contract from Rule 4 Signing Utility
custom_steps: WHEN User expands addendum B
custom_expected: THEN Signing Bonus or Dual Sports should be active in addendum B

title: User verifies signing bonus/dual sports amount
custom_preconds: GIVEN User is at addendum B in a minor contract
custom_steps: WHEN User expands active signing bonus or dual sports
custom_expected: THEN Total Actual value in addendum B matches Actual Bonus value on rule 4 signing bonus utility

custom_steps:

AND Clicks Rule 4 Signing Bonuses on popover
custom_expected: THEN Rule 4 Signing Bonus utility appears on page

title: User clicks edit button
custom_preconds: GIVEN User is viewing rule 4 signing bonus utility widget
custom_steps: WHEN User clicks edit button
custom_expected: THEN The rule 4 signing bonus utility widget goes into edit mode

title: User finds a player who has not signed a contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN User is on the Rule 4 Signing bonus Utility
custom_steps: WHEN User finds a player who has nothing filled out in their row
custom_expected: THEN User has found player who has not signed a contract to the club

title: User clicks the NSD checkbox
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User is on rule 4 signing bonus utility
AND and is in edit mode
AND has found a player who has not signed for the club for the current season
custom_steps: WHEN User clicks NSD checkbox
custom_expected:
THEN Player turns black (if player is past rule 4 signing deadline)
** If player already has a contract/black row then no change to color will be made
AND Checkbox now has check

title: User clicks Save
custom_preconds: GIVEN User has set a player as NSD
custom_steps: WHEN User clicks Save
custom_expected: THEN All changes are saved to player

title: User views over/under column
custom_preconds: GIVEN User is viewing rule 4 signing bonus utility
custom_steps: WHEN User views Over/Under Column
custom_expected:
THEN This column shows how much the actual signing bonus varies from signing bonus value for pick
AND values without signing bonus value are shown in black
AND Values over show in red with a + sign
AND Values under shown in green with a - sign

custom_steps:

title: User navigates to Rule 4 Signing Utility via Minor Contracts on Left Nav
custom_preconds: GIVEN User is logged in as club admin
custom_steps:
WHEN User navigates to minor contracts on left navigation
AND Clicks Rule 4 Signing Bonuses on popover
custom_expected: THEN Rule 4 Signing Bonus utility appears on page

title: User adds a player to Rule 4 Utility
custom_preconds: GIVEN User is on the Rule 4 Signing Utility
custom_steps:
WHEN User clicks edit
AND Clicks Add row
AND Adds a name to the new row
AND Adds a projected signing of 1,000,000 ( Or amount that would make it past the actual signing pool )
AND Clicks Save
custom_expected: THEN A new player is added to the rule 4 signing utility with a projected signing

title: User toggles projected signings to yes
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User is on the Rule 4 Signing Utility 
AND Has added a new player row with a projected bonus
custom_steps: WHEN User toggles projected signings to Yes
custom_expected:
THEN The penalty tax and penalty draft selections will update with the newly added signing bonus

-The penalty is shown as 0% if the total signing bonus is less than the pool
AND If value is greater than 0% show the following calculated penalties
0.1% upto 9.9% , the penalty is 75% of overage value
10% or greater, the penalty is 100% of overage value

Calculating Non-Monetary Penalties 0% upto 4.9% - None 5% upto 9.9%, show penalty as Loss of 1st round pick 10% upto 14.9%, show penalty as Loss of 1st and 2nd round picks 15% or greater, show penalty as Loss of first round picks for next 2 years

title: Log into EBIS 2.5 as BOC
custom_steps:
WHEN User inputs BOC login credentials (admin-boc-all/beginathens975)
AND Clicks login
custom_expected: THEN User successfully logs into ebis 2.5 homepage

title: User goes to a domestic amateur player via advanced search
custom_preconds: GIVEN User is logged in as BOC
custom_steps:
WHEN User goes to advanced search
AND uses filter domestic amateur player
AND uses filter player is passed over
AND Clicks Search
custom_expected: THEN User opens player profile of a passed over domestic amateur player

title: User creates a new minor contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN User is on a passed over domestic amateur player
custom_steps:
WHEN User clicks create a new button
AND Clicks Creates a new minor contract
custom_expected: THEN A new domestic minor contract appears

title: User adds all required fields to minor contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN User is  on a domestic amateur contract
custom_steps:
WHEN User adds and fills the following sections and dropdowns

-Org
-Club
-Beginning In Year(Have it begin in current year)
-Addendum B Signing Bonus (Input amount 175,000,current date as payment date)
-Addendum C
-Toggle Addendum F to No
-Execution of Contract[Authorized Signatory]
custom_expected: THEN All required fields are filled out

title: User pushes contract to terms accepted
custom_preconds:
GIVEN Minor contract is open
AND All required fields are filled out
custom_steps:
WHEN User clicks Submit to BOC
AND Clicks Accept terms
custom_expected:
THEN Contract reaches Terms submitted
AND Contract reaches Terms accepted

title: User navigates to Rule 4 Signing Utility via Minor Contracts on Left Nav
custom_preconds: GIVEN User is logged in as club admin
custom_steps:
WHEN User navigates to minor contracts on left navigation
AND Clicks Rule 4 Signing Bonuses on popover
custom_expected: THEN Rule 4 Signing Bonus utility appears on page

title: User scrolls to bottom of Rule 4 Signing Utility
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User has created a new domestic amateur player
AND User is on Rule 4 Signing Utility widget
AND Is on the Org that the player was created for
custom_steps: WHEN User scrolls to the bottom of widget
custom_expected: THEN Passed over Player should appear on bottom of widget with signing bonus value
